statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SA.name, AA.name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.uid , AA.email , AA.name , AA.utype , AA.agency_uid , AA.passwd , AA.phone1 , AA.phone2 , AA.phone3 , AA.introduce , AA.rank , AA.image , AA.image_width , AA.image_height
, SA.name as agency_name
, AA.ApiRequestID , M3.Name as ApiType , M4.Name as Status , BB.RequestDate
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsUser AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TApiRequest BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ApiRequestID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsAgency SA WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.agency_uid = SA.uid LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.ApiType = M3.Code AND M3.ParentCode = 'ApiType' LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M4 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.Status = M4.Code AND M4.ParentCode = 'ApiStatus' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.agency_uid = #AgencyUid#
AND ( AA.name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR AA.email LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsUser AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsUser AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.uid = #uid#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSmapsUser ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ApiRequestID, uid, email, name, utype, agency_uid, passwd, phone1, phone2, phone3, introduce, rank, image, image_width, image_height ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ApiRequestID#, #uid#, #email#, #name#, #utype#, #agency_uid#, #passwd#, #phone1#, #phone2#, #phone3#, #introduce#, #rank#, #image#, #image_width#, #image_height# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsUser SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ApiRequestID = #ApiRequestID# , uid = #uid# , email = #email# , name = #name# , utype = #utype# , agency_uid = #agency_uid# , passwd = #passwd# , phone1 = #phone1# , phone2 = #phone2# , phone3 = #phone3# , introduce = #introduce# , rank = #rank# , image = #image# , image_width = #image_width# , image_height = #image_height# WHERE ID = #ID#
